H
1
A
a
-- eq --
{"Col": 1, "Operator": "eq", "Value": "a"}
-- want --
H
a
-- less-than --
{"Col": 1, "Operator": "lt", "Value": "a"}
-- want --
H
1
A
-- greater-than --
{"Col": 1, "Operator": "gt", "Value": "a"}
-- want --
H
-- in --
H
1
A
a
-- less-than case-insensitive --
{"Col": 1, "Operator": "lt", "Value": "a", "CaseInsensitive": true}
-- want --
H
1
-- eq exclude --
{"Col": 1, "Operator": "eq", "Value": "a", "Exclude": true}
-- want --
H
1
A
-- in --
H
1
A
a
-- regex --
{"Col": 1, "Operator": "re", "Value": "[^A]"}
-- want --
H
1
a
-- regex case-insensitive --
{"Col": 1, "Operator": "re", "Value": "[^A]", "CaseInsensitive": true}
-- want --
H
1
